title: I have to say thanks RIOT :)
body:
I know everyone else has already said it but i have to say it too
I really appreciate the gifts you have given us, i think it will bring out the best in people this year, a nice positive approach goes a long way :)
i got Infernal Alistar on my main account by far the best looking Alistar skin i have thanks heaps :)
i have just played a game where almost everyone was using their gifted skin, it was one of the most happy spirited and fun games i have had in a while
thanks

replies.body: Thank you for being a positive player in our community!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HxU1HLZo,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-09T10:14:25.216+0000)
>
> Thank you for being a positive player in our community!

Are you aware of the RADS eroor that many player have been getting today 
(probably due to the gifting)?

Hey man, 

We are aware of the issue. It seems to be a global issue and we were definitely working on it as soon as we were aware. Most of the issues should be resolved now.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HxU1HLZo,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T10:24:54.944+0000)
>
> Hey man, 
> 
> We are aware of the issue. It seems to be a global issue and we were definitely working on it as soon as we were aware. Most of the issues should be resolved now.

hey maraudaur is there a way i can privatly chat to you have something you may need to see this is important

add me and private message me on facebook

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100006763489424
Every day Rioters impress me more and more with their community commitment. Keep fightin' the good fight, Maraudaur.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HxU1HLZo,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-01-09T10:24:54.944+0000)
>
> Hey man, 
> 
> We are aware of the issue. It seems to be a global issue and we were definitely working on it as soon as we were aware. Most of the issues should be resolved now.

Thanks.
Hopefully it will work out soon.
